projects.name: GenomeViz
projects.summary: Interactive visualization for genomic regions and variant mapping.

projects.name: CellClass
projects.summary: ML model to classify cell types from gene expression data.

projects.name: BioSense
projects.summary: Portable biosensor that integrates with an AI model to detect glucose levels in saliva samples.

projects.name: ProteinPredict
projects.summary: Deep learning model for predicting protein structures from amino acid sequences.

projects.name: EcoBot
projects.summary: Autonomous rover for environmental monitoring and bio-sample collection using onboard sensors.

projects.name: NeuroLens
projects.summary: EEG-based headset that detects attention levels and visualizes brain activity.

projects.name: PathoAI
projects.summary: AI system to detect pathogens in microscopy images using convolutional neural networks.

projects.name: MedChat
projects.summary: Conversational assistant trained on biomedical datasets for answering medical questions.

projects.name: BioLogger
projects.summary: Hardware-Software system that collects real-time physiological signals for analysis and visualization.
